thread.section_title: Ashburn Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely in every way
thread.title_full: Lovely in every way - Review of Ashburn Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 953judithc
title: Lovely in every way
text: I stayed here for a week in October, and highly recommend it. It is a smaller, charming hotel in a perfect location. The room was not large, but was entirely adequate. The toiletries were Gilchrist & Soames. I loved being able to make coffee in the room, and to have a different type of cookie each night. The tube station is very close, as are several restaurants. Albert Hall, the V&A and the Natural History museum are just a short walk away. The breakfast was good, and staff were pleasant and helpful.
